Typography

Typography is the atomic element of interface design. It sets the visual tone for the style across all applications.

Header typography

h1 Heading, Page Title for Desktop - 25px Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif

h2 Heading, Widget Title in Builder - 22px Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif

h3 Heading, Black Nav Title / Menu Title / Daughter menu titles - 16px Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif

h4 Heading, Subtitles in modals and daughter menus - 15px Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif 

                <h1>h1 Heading, Page Title for Desktop - 25px Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif</h1>

                <h2>h2 Heading, Widget Title in Builder - 22px Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif</h2>

                <h3>h3 Heading, Black Nav Title / Menu Title / Daughter menu titles - 16px Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif</h3>

                <h4>h4 Heading, Subtitles in modals and daughter menus - 15px Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif</h4>

Content typography

The default interface element text size is 14px, and the default font is Arial

Small content size is 12px, and Arial

Extra small content size is 11px, and Arial

For small chart element text (12px and 11px), use Verdana. Because it is a wider font than Arial, it is more legible at the smaller sizes.

The legend on a chart is 12px, Verdana

Extra small text for numbers on charts is 11px, Verdana

                <p>The default interface element text size is 14px, and the default font is Arial</p>

                <p class="small">Small content size is 12px, and Arial</p>

                <p class="xs-small">Extra small content size is 11px, and Arial</p>

                <p class="small legend">The legend on a chart is 12px, Verdana</p>

                <p class="xs-small chart">Extra small text for numbers on charts is 11px, Verdana</p>

Text color

See specific design pattern blueprints for information on what colors to use on other user interface elements besides the text variations shown below.

See the Colors section for details on all color implementations.

Headers: Gray 80 (old Design Language Black 8), #323232

Standard text: Gray 60 (old Design Language Black 6), #5a5a5a

Disabled font: Gray 40 (old Design Language Black 4), #959595

Disabled text on gray background: Gray 20 (old Design Language Black 2), #c7c7c7

For links on white backgrounds, use link blue #037bbf

For links on Gray 50 background (standard gray panel), use Blue 10 #c0e6ff

For links on Gray 80 background (popover, and top nav background), use Blue 10 #c0e6ff
